entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
